official_title: A bill to amend title VII of the Civil Rights Act of 1964 to prohibit discrimination against individuals because they are handicapped, and for other purposes.
short_title: Equal Employment Opportunity for the Handicapped Act of 1981
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Equal Employment Opportunity for the Handicapped Act of 1981 - Amends title VII (Equal Employment Opportunity) of the Civil Rights Act of 1964 to make it an unlawful employment practice to discriminate against any individual who is physically or mentally handicapped.
